channel.title: Open Source on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Paul Cutler

item.title: Another Reason to Love Open Source
item.description: I’ve been using free and open source software (FOSS) for over twenty years and I’ve involved in with different FOSS projects for ten to fifteen years (on and off). Thare are so many different aspects of the open source community that I love (community being a big one to start with) and here’s another example. I’m trying to build a new website using Python and the Pyramid framework. I want to interact with APIs on the Discogs website.
